text: Allah issey pehle bahut se mawaqe (occassions) par tumhari madad kar chuka hai, abhi gazwa e hunain ke roz (uski dastgiri ki shaan tum dekh chuke ho) ,us roz tumhein apni kasrat e tadaad ka garrah (proud) tha magar woh tumhare kuch kaam na aayi aur zameen apni wusat ke bawajood tumpar tangg ho gayi aur tum peeth pher kar bhaag nikle
